alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Houston; Mower; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 7:53AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Small Hail and Lightning Reported This Morning... At 746 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a few thunderstorm along the Minnesota-Iowa border into southwest Wisconsin. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail, sleet, freezing rain and lightning. Some thundersnow is possible west of Highway 52 in southeast Minnesota. SOURCE...Reports of pea sized hail, freezing rain, and lightning have been received over the past hour. IMPACT...Poor travel on slick roads. Lightning strike possible too. Locations impacted include... La Crosse, Sparta, Tomah, Decorah, Richland Center, La Crescent, Mauston, Viroqua, Waukon, Caledonia, Lansing, Onalaska, Holmen, West Salem, Boscobel, New Lisbon, Fennimore, Westby, Adams and Rushford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
